title: (7) of section 5 of the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 (No. 35 of 2019) and
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 

(Extension of Periods of Leave) Order 2024. 

(2) This Order shall come into operation on 1 August 2024.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited parent leave benefit act 2019 (extension period leave) order 2024 (2) order shall come operation 1 august 2024

title: (7) of section 5 of the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 (No. 35 of 2019) and
heading: In this Order –
text_raw:
2. 

In this Order – 

“Act of 2021” means the Family Leave and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2021 
(No. 4 of 2021); 

“Principal Act” means the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 (No. 35 of 
2019).
text_norm: 2 order - act 2021 mean family leave miscellaneous provision act 2021 (no 4 2021) principal act mean parent leave benefit act 2019 (no 35 2019)

title: (7) of section 5 of the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 (No. 35 of 2019) and
heading: 3. Section 5(1) (as amended by section 26 of the Act of 2021) of the
text_raw:
3. Section 5(1) (as amended by section 26 of the Act of 2021) of the 

Principal Act is amended by the substitution of “9 weeks” for “7 weeks”.
text_norm: 3 section 5(1) (as amended section 26 act 2021) principal act amended substitution 9 week 7 week

title: (7) of section 5 of the Parent’s Leave and Benefit Act 2019 (No. 35 of 2019) and
heading: 4. Section 16(1) (as amended by section 29 of the Act of 2021) of the
text_raw:
4. Section 16(1) (as amended by section 29 of the Act of 2021) of the 

Principal Act is amended by the substitution of “9 weeks” for “7 weeks”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 21st June, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The Minister for Social Protection consents to the foregoing Order. 

[300] 3

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2024. 

Heather Humphreys, 

Minister for Social Protection. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2024. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

18 June, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 4 [300]
